connection_type.title: Connection Type
connection_type.description: Choose how to connect to your XY Screens device.

data_description.connection_type: Select whether to connect via a serial port (RS485 USB adapter) or network (RS485-to-Ethernet converter).

setup_connection.title: Device Setup
setup_connection.description: Configure your XY Screens device connection and settings.

data_description.serial_port: The serial port your RS485 USB adapter is connected to.
data_description.host: The IP address of your RS485-to-Ethernet converter.
data_description.port: The TCP port number of your RS485-to-Ethernet converter.
data_description.address: The hexadecimal address of the device (AAEEEE for XY Screens, EEEEEE for See Max).
data_description.device_type: The type of device you are connecting.
data_description.time_open: Time in seconds needed to fully open/retract the device.
data_description.time_close: Time in seconds needed to fully close/extend the device.
data_description.inverted: This integration follows the Cover Entity, where open means the screen is retracted and closed means the screen is extended, the same way curtains and garage doors work. For a projection screen this is counterintuitive. You can reverse the behavior.

data_description.time_open: Time in seconds needed to fully open/retract the projector screen.
data_description.time_close: Time in seconds needed to fully close/extend the projector screen.
